mapper.insert: insert into comic_roomsales (roomsales_id,roomsales_num,roomsales_totalprice,roomsales_time) select roomuse_id, roomuse_num, (select CEIL(trunc((sysdate-roomuse_starttime)*60*24)/10)*500 from comic_roomuse where roomuse_id=#{id}) as roomuse_price, roomuse_endtime from comic_roomuse where roomuse_id=#{id}

insert into comic_productsales (productsales_id, productsales_qty, productsales_time, productsales_product, productsales_order_price) select order_id, order_qty, order_time, (select product_name from comic_productstock where product_num = order_product_num) as order_product, (select product_price from comic_productstock where product_num = order_product_num)*order_qty from comic_order where order_id=#{id} and (select roomuse_starttime from comic_roomuse where roomuse_id = #{id}) < order_time
